properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE COMM_NO = 1 AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , POST_TITLE , C.ENROLL_DATE , BOARD_VIEW FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_USER U ON (U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE COMM_NO = 1 AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC, COMM_POST_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TB_COMMUNITY ( COMM_POST_NO , COMM_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , USER_NO , ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMPNO.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO TB_COMM_FILE ( FILE_NO , COMM_POST_NO , COMM_NO , FILE_NAME , FILE_UPDATE , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_COMMPNO.CURRVAL , 1 , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE TB_COMMUNITY SET BOARD_VIEW = BOARD_VIEW + 1 WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_ID , CATEGORY_NAME , POST_CONTENT , POST_TITLE , C.ENROLL_DATE , BOARD_VIEW FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_USER U ON (C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND COMM_NO = 1 AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT FILE_NO , FILE_NAME , FILE_UPDATE , FILE_PATH FROM TB_COMM_FILE WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND COMM_NO = 1
UPDATE TB_COMMUNITY SET CATEGORY_NAME = ? , POST_TITLE = ? , POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND COMM_NO = 1
UPDATE TB_COMM_FILE SET FILE_NAME = ? , FILE_UPDATE = ? , FILE_PATH = ? WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND COMM_NO = 1
INSERT INTO TB_COMM_FILE ( FILE_NO , COMM_POST_NO , COMM_NO , FILE_NAME , FILE_UPDATE , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE TB_COMMUNITY SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND COMM_NO = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE POST_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND COMM_NO = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE POST_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND COMM_NO = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_ID , FILE_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , POST_CONTENT , POST_TITLE , C.ENROLL_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , BOARD_VIEW , STATUS , COMM_NO , LIKE_COUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) WHERE C.POST_TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND COMM_NO = 1 ORDER BY C.ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_ID , FILE_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , POST_CONTENT , POST_TITLE , C.ENROLL_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , BOARD_VIEW , STATUS , COMM_NO , LIKE_COUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) WHERE C.POST_CONTENT LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND COMM_NO = 1 ORDER BY C.ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LIKECOUNT FROM TB_LIKE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND LIKE_POST_TYPE = 1 AND LIKE_POST_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_LIKE SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ? AND LIKE_POST_TYPE = 1 AND LIKE_POST_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_LIKE ( USER_NO , LIKE_POST_TYPE , LIKE_POST_NO ) VALUES ( ? , 1 , ? )
UPDATE TB_COMMUNITY SET LIKE_COUNT = LIKE_COUNT - 1 WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE TB_COMMUNITY SET LIKE_COUNT = LIKE_COUNT + 1 WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT REPLY_NO , USER_ID , REPLY_CONTENT , R.ENROLL_DATE FROM TB_REPLY R JOIN TB_USER U ON (R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO TB_REPLY ( REPLY_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , REPLY_CATEGORY , COMM_POST_NO , USER_NO , ENROLL_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL , ? , 1 , ? , ? , SYSDATE )
UPDATE TB_REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? , UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE TB_REPLY SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY WHERE COMM_NO = 2 AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_ID , POST_TITLE , C.ENROLL_DATE , BOARD_VIEW FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_USER U ON (U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE COMM_NO = 2 AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC, COMM_POST_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_ID , FILE_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , POST_CONTENT , POST_TITLE , C.ENROLL_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , BOARD_VIEW , STATUS , COMM_NO , LIKE_COUNT FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_USER U ON (C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE COMM_POST_NO = ? AND COMM_NO = 2 AND STATUS = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.*
FROM ( SELECT COMM_POST_NO , USER_ID , POST_TITLE , C.ENROLL_DATE , BOARD_VIEW FROM TB_COMMUNITY C JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) WHERE COMM_NO = 2 AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY C.ENROLL_DATE DESC, BOARD_VIEW DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM <= 5
